      • createNewConfiguration

        public org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration createNewConfiguration(java.io.File PATH_CFG_HIBERNATE,
                                                              org.hibernate.cfg.Configuration configuration,
                                                              java.lang.Class<? extends org.hibernate.Interceptor> interceptorClass)
        Method for try into o many ways to set a configuration object from a file XML configuration. This method is a overkill, is try to load the configuration file in many ways before give up
        Parameters:
        PATH_CFG_HIBERNATE - the String path to the XML configuration file.
        configuration - the Configuration of Hibernate.
        interceptorClass - the Class Interceptor of Hibernate.
        Returns:
        the new Configuration of Hibernate with a Interceptor.

      • getCurrentSession

        public org.hibernate.Session getCurrentSession()
        Returns a session from the session context. If there is no session in the context it opens a session, stores it in the context and returns it. This context is intended to be used with a hibernate.cfg.xml including the following property property name="current_session_context_class" thread /property This would return the current open session or if this does not exist, will insert a new session.
        Returns:
        the session.

      • buildSessionFactory

        public void buildSessionFactory(java.lang.String DB_OUTPUT_HIBERNATE,
                                java.lang.String USER_HIBERNATE,
                                java.lang.String PASS_HIBERNATE,
                                java.lang.String DRIVER_DATABASE,
                                java.lang.String DIALECT_DATABASE,
                                java.lang.String DIALECT_DATABASE_HIBERNATE,
                                java.lang.String HOST_DATABASE,
                                java.lang.String PORT_DATABASE,
                                java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> LIST_ANNOTATED_CLASS)
        Method to build a Session Factory with code and the annotation class
        Parameters:
        DB_OUTPUT_HIBERNATE - name database
        USER_HIBERNATE - user name database
        PASS_HIBERNATE - password database
        DRIVER_DATABASE - driver for database
        DIALECT_DATABASE - dialect for database
        DIALECT_DATABASE_HIBERNATE - specific HSQL dialect for database
        HOST_DATABASE - host database
        PORT_DATABASE - port database
        LIST_ANNOTATED_CLASS - list of all annotated classes

        HOST_DATABASE - host database
        PORT_DATABASE - port database
        LIST_ANNOTATED_CLASS - list of all annotated classes
        LIST_RESOURCE_XML - list of the XML file resource
